project.title_note: The project is released under three title variants depending on the language market. English and Japanese use the same title 'live-ON!', while the Indonesian version uses 'Uripurup'.

release_formats.description: Main release format â€“ anima (Indonesian-original animated series, likely 2D or hybrid style, episodic or short-season format). 'Anima' is the project's custom term for animation, positioning it as Indonesia's equivalent cultural medium to cartoon and anime.
